Title: Relates to authorizing commercial mortgage forbearance during the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Relates to authorizing commercial mortgage forbearance during the COVID-19 pandemic; requires New York regulated institutions to make applications for forbearance available to qualified commercial mortgagors and to grant such forbearance for a period of ninety days, subject to the safety and soundness requirements of the regulated institution.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to authorizing commercial mortgage forbearance during the COVID-19 pandemic
